content.text: Match ends, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 4, BATE Borisov 1.
Second Half ends, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 4, BATE Borisov 1.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Denis Polyakov (BATE Borisov) because of an injury.
Nikolai Signevich (BATE Borisov) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Aleksandr Karnitski (BATE Borisov).
Stefan Kießling (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Stefan Kießling (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left.
Attempt missed. Kevin Kampl (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Stefan Kießling.
Attempt saved. Filip Mladenovic (BATE Borisov) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Corner,  BATE Borisov. Conceded by Wendell.
Aleksandr Volodko (BATE Borisov) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Karim Bellarabi (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Foul by Igor Stasevich (BATE Borisov).
Stefan Kießling (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Kevin Kampl (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Nikolai Signevich (BATE Borisov) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, BATE Borisov. Maksim Volodko replaces Mikhail Gordeychuk.
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Julian Brandt replaces Hakan Calhanoglu.
Goal!  Bayer 04 Leverkusen 4, BATE Borisov 1. Hakan Calhanoglu (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Filip Mladenovic (BATE Borisov) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
Penalty conceded by Filip Mladenovic (BATE Borisov) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
Attempt blocked. Hakan Calhanoglu (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Aleksandr Volodko (BATE Borisov).
Karim Bellarabi (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Filip Mladenovic (BATE Borisov) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Roberto Hilbert (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Stefan Kießling replaces Chicharito.
Offside, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Kyriakos Papadopoulos tries a through ball, but Karim Bellarabi is caught offside.
Foul by Jonathan Tah (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Aleksandr Volodko (BATE Borisov) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Wendell (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Chicharito (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ilya Aleksievich (BATE Borisov).
Corner,  Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Conceded by Nemanja Milunovic.
Substitution, BATE Borisov. Aleksandr Karnitski replaces Dmitri Baga.
Goal!  Bayer 04 Leverkusen 3, BATE Borisov 1. Chicharito (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Kevin Kampl.
Foul by Denis Polyakov (BATE Borisov).
Hakan Calhanoglu (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Hakan Calhanoglu (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Kevin Kampl.
Attempt saved. Chicharito (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from very close range is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Karim Bellarabi.
Foul by Igor Stasevich (BATE Borisov).
Kevin Kampl (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Bayer 04 Leverkusen 2, BATE Borisov 1. Hakan Calhanoglu (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Karim Bellarabi.
Igor Stasevich (BATE Borisov) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Wendell (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Second Half begins Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1, BATE Borisov 1.
First Half ends, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1, BATE Borisov 1.
Attempt saved. Chicharito (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Corner,  Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Conceded by Filip Mladenovic.
Attempt saved. Kyriakos Papadopoulos (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) header from the left side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Hakan Calhanoglu.
Dmitri Baga (BATE Borisov) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Admir Mehmedi (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Dmitri Baga (BATE Borisov).
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Christoph Kramer replaces Lars Bender because of an injury.
Kyriakos Papadopoulos (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) is shown the yellow card.
Attempt saved. Kevin Kampl (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Hakan Calhanoglu.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Attempt blocked. Hakan Calhanoglu (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Karim Bellarabi.
Foul by Lars Bender (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).

Substitution, BATE Borisov. Aleksandr Volodko replaces Alyaksandr Hleb because of an injury.
Offside, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Bernd Leno tries a through ball, but Chicharito is caught offside.
Nemanja Milunovic (BATE Borisov) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Chicharito (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Attempt missed. Jonathan Tah (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) left footed shot from the centre of the box is just a bit too high following a corner.
Corner,  Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Conceded by Kaspars Dubra.
Attempt blocked. Chicharito (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Kevin Kampl.

Attempt missed. Admir Mehmedi (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Karim Bellarabi with a through ball following a fast break.
Corner,  BATE Borisov. Conceded by Hakan Calhanoglu.
Kevin Kampl (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Igor Stasevich (BATE Borisov).
Offside, BATE Borisov. Dmitri Baga tries a through ball, but Nikolai Signevich is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Chicharito (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Karim Bellarabi.
Filip Mladenovic (BATE Borisov) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Karim Bellarabi (Bayer 04 Leverkusen).
Goal!  Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1, BATE Borisov 1. Nemanja Milunovic (BATE Borisov) header from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Igor Stasevich with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  BATE Borisov. Conceded by Kyriakos Papadopoulos.
Foul by Alyaksandr Hleb (BATE Borisov).
Wendell (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mikhail Gordeychuk (BATE Borisov).
Admir Mehmedi (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt saved. Kevin Kampl (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Hakan Calhanoglu.
Goal!  Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1, BATE Borisov 0. Admir Mehmedi (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Hakan Calhanoglu.
Offside, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Chicharito tries a through ball, but Karim Bellarabi is caught offside.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
